hints.content:
Each whole has $8$ equal parts, so each part has a length of $\dfrac{1}{8}$.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled Point A, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled Point B, a tick mark labeled Point C, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled point D, a tick mark at 1, and two unlabeled tick marks. Eight equal rectangles labeled one-eighth are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. !

hints.content:
We need to shade $\dfrac78$.  



[[☃ image 1]]



What point is located at $\dfrac78$?

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, six unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark with a dot labeled seven-eighths, a tick mark at 1, and two unlabeled tick marks. An arrow points to the right from the tick mark at 0 to the tick mark labeled with a dot at seven-eighths. Eight equal rectangles are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. Seven rectangles from the left are shaded and the eighth rectangle is not shaded. The set of shaded rectangles is labeled seven-eighths. !

question.content:
**Which point is at $\dfrac{7}{8}$ on the number line?**



[[☃ image 1]]

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled Point A, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled Point B, a tick mark labeled Point C, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled point D, a tick mark at 1, and two unlabeled tick marks. Eight equal rectangles are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one interval on the number line. !
